name: places/ChIJL48V6iFawokR5-CPap8mJJM

displayName.text: Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Taxpayer Assistance Center

adrFormatAddress: 290 Broadway, New York, NY 10007-1823, USA

originalText.text:
I am shocked at the service i received at this office. I made my appointment in advance and got there on time. I arrived at 9:14, got my number and took my seat. I got my transcripts and was out of there by 9:27. The front desk lady was friendly and the guy that handled my request was gruff but got the job done. A couple of things to note:

This is not a walk in center, you need an appointment. There is an 800 number to call at which there is a kind of lengthy wait time (15 minutes when i called)

Dont take any weapons because there is a metal detector at the entrance.

Most federal employees are beleaguered and i have found that you will catch more flies with honey. Just be nice and they will be nice.

I fully expected to be there a long time and have to deal with a huge crowd or snotty employees. Not so. Good job to those who work at this IRS office.

originalText.text: One of your employees Jordan pierce is being taken to court for stolen property as well as showering naked with my 6 year old daughter, which is DISGUSTING. If he gets to keep his job after this, I'm going to the news

originalText.text:
Can't get anyone to answer.  I submitted my taxes electronically early April. Still getting the "still being processed" message about my refund.
But they sure can send out payment notices including penalties in a speedy fashion.  Actually the IRS should receive a penalty for making me wait so long.

Can't get anyone to answer.  I submitted my taxes electronically early April. Still getting the "still being processed" message about my refund.
But they sure can send out payment notices including penalties in a speedy fashion.  Actually the IRS should receive a penalty for making me wait so long.

originalText.text: Such rude staff, have no patience for people with few questions. When I was trying to confirm more details, the staff kept interrupting me even said,” are you not listening?”  Although the assistant in the appointment call was good and the lady at front desk (IRS 7th Floor) was very nice & helpful. But the taxpayers assistant center officer there was so rude.

text.text: Such rude staff, have no patience for people with few questions. When I was trying to confirm more details, the staff kept interrupting me even said,” are you not listening?”  Although the assistant in the appointment call was good and the lady at front desk (IRS 7th Floor) was very nice & helpful. But the taxpayers assistant center officer there was so rude.

originalText.text: We arrived with oxygen, bags, walking cane and the receptionist was very clear, very helpful and direct as she told me to come back when I had an appointment. Though I was disappointed, I have no complaints. She was nice to me.
